altername_name: くにおくん ザ・ワールド クラシックスコレクション
name: Kunio Kun: The World Classics Collection
overview: Kunio-kun: The World Classics Collection is the ultimate collection of the legendary Kunio-kun series. It includes 18 titles in one package. The game interface such as game description and trophies are English localized. Players can unlock various customization features for the online mode such as avatars by unlocking trophies. All listed titles support online network play, so players can enjoy the game both offline and online with up to 3 other players. Also, 4 player co-op is available for the games that offer story mode in addition to the competitive mode.
